title: De-Risk Environmental Synthetic Biology
description: Create ecological wind tunnels that mimic real-world complexity to assess the safety of engineered organisms.

title: Programmable Cynanobacteria
description: Develop high-throughput experiments to create the genetic toolkits needed to reprogram environmentally important microbes.

title: AI for Engineering Biology
description: Accelerate reliable cellular reprogramming by learning from diverse experimental data sets.

title: Improved Cyber-Bio Security
description: Enable the traceability of engineered cells in natural environments to ensure trustworthiness.

title: Bioligical Standards & Metrology
description: Demonstrate the power of rigorous applications of standards and metrology for biological engineering.

title: Community Building
description: Establish the teams and connect to the people able to ensure the long-term benefits of this research are realised.
